pages.text: A stick with sugar on it.$(br2)...wait wait wait, there's more to it!$(br)If you place this stick so that its underside is immersed in $(l:magical_blocks/liquid_crystal)Liquid Crystal$(/l), you just have to slowly dissolve more sugar in the liquid until the stick turns into a sweet-crunchy candy stick.

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: You might even be able to add more stuff than just plain Sugar when immersed? Liquid $(italic)Crystal$() and all that...

pages.title: Growing Rock Candy
pages.text: $(thing)Silk Touch$() keeps their size for use as fancy lights, or just for storage.

pages.title: Gemstone Rock Candy
pages.text: Dissolving $(l:general/gemstone_powder)Gemstone Powder$(/l) instead of Sugar in the liquid allowed the Rock Candy to take on the gemstone's typical color.$(br2)You always wanted to know what those taste like. Definitely seems like a healthier option than snorting them up your nose.
